price: Allah ba Ya kãmã ku da laifi sabõda yãsasshiya a cikin rantsuwõyinku. Kuma amma Yana kama ku sabõda abin da zukãtanku* suka sanã'anta. Kuma Allah Mai gãfara ne, Mai haƙuri.
arabic: لَّا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِٱللَّغۡوِ فِيٓ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَاخِذُكُم بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٞ
footnotes: * Yasasshiyar rantsuwa ita ce, a wurin Mãlik, rantsuwa a kan abin da mutum ke ganin sa tabbatacce ne, sai ya bayyana daga bãya akasin tunãninsa. Kamar ya ce Wallãhi bã ni da kuɗi, ga saninsa kuwa haka ne bã ya da su, bai sani ba ashe wani yã mutu, yã yi gãdo. A Shafi'i ita ce: ã'aha Wallahi, I, wallãhi, a cikin magana bã da nufi ba.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
